ISSUE.TITLE: Excel export does not support all types of product attributes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 - 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: Export a product whose attributes have any `Control Type` that does not imply `Values`. These include, for example, `Control Type = TextBox`. Source: PS#16360

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Updated states info connected to Ukraine areas

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6021 Add support all types of product attributes to the Export/Import products
